resources.string: To allow audio visualization view to process audio stream app needs an access to your Microphone.

Flashlight needs permission to access your Camera, Storage and Microphone.
Camera: This lets Flashlight use your Camera flashlight inside the app.
Microphone: This lets Flashlight to visualise song that playing on the device.
Storage: This lets Flashlight access media like songs on your phone and its SD Card.
Returned from app settings to Flashlight

The world first android app that turns your phone into disco light machine! Flashlight makes use of your phone's internal camera LED lights and microphone to create various lighting effects based on song you are playing. No need for glowsticks, Flashlight is the original disco light and dance light! Just turn on any music and it takes over pulsing to the beat of the music. Turn your home into party mode.
